Text: The audio is off on this movie. Funny how the sample he shows doesnt have anyone talking. Dont bother with Dload. Come aXXo  give us a good copy soon!

is the audio really off on this? or is it another case of a n00b without the right codecs or a shitty divx player inadvertantly nuking an otherwise good release?
can anyone confirm?

I'm telling you it is. I have several players. And I have dloaded alot of movies. The audio is off. I wish it wasnt, I would like to watch it. And you dont see me commenting this on any other movies on TPB.
Yes, the audio is out of sync. However, you can just use nandub/virtualdub to re-sync with 500ms and the audio will be alright.
Ljudet ur sync....instämmer med föregående talare...alltså tack för UL men ffs kolla innan.
